content: the first in order to place it on your left hand needle pull your working yarn tight place a bor marker you will begin knitting from your stitches that are on the left-hand needle hat body work in 2x2 ribbing until piece measures 26 30 cm / 10 12 then place another three markers so that the four including bor marker are at roughly equidistant points to each other decrease row round 1 *sm p2tog work sts as established until m* repeat between asterisks until eor 4 sts decrease 64 68 sts remaining round 2 to 8 repeat as above by the end of round 8 there will be 36 40 sts remaining © 2025 hj ko this pattern may be printed and used for personal use only it may not be reproduced sold or redistributed without the author s consent round 9 to 10 depending on where you put your markers you may no longer have a consistent *k2 p2* pattern in your work that s okay for the odd stitch that doesn t fit into the 2x2 pattern just work those sts as already established round 9 *k2tog p2* until eor 27 30 sts remaining round 10 repeat rule of *k1 p2tog* until eor 13 21 sts remaining x/xl size only round 11 *k1 p2tog* until eor 14 sts remaining finishing off cut yarn and pull through live sts tighten and tie together optional fold the bottom edge of your work at 8 cm / 3 towards the hat body sew the brim into place acknowledgments it boggles my mind that strangers would give me hours of their time and yarn to help me release a knitting pattern i am eternally grateful to and humbled by my 😭 testers thank you for helping a baby designer on her pattern creation journey bookwormnat appleqtpie boundarycreek lumberjill zrinka asmezgeja kiaraharvey spacerail / just yarnin and joeyroomakes © 2025 hj ko this pattern may be printed and used for personal use only it may not be reproduced sold or redistributed without the author s consent
